entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers later in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening then clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
